Dating: PTOLEMAIC PERIOD (not before); GRAECO-ROMAN PERIOD; ROMAN PERIOD (not after)
Technique: PRESSED IN A FORM/MODEL; ENGRAVED; RELIEF
Name: Vase of Bes
Description: Vase showing the face of the god Bes. The plume of feathers above the head is missing. The back is smooth and the piece has a stable base. The facial features are well defined.
